hero.question: US strikes Iran by March 7, 2026?
hero.prob_take: Traders are pricing in a 27.5% shot at US strikes on Iran by next March, down 6.5 points in the last day as diplomatic noise drowns out the saber-rattling. Watch whether the incoming administration actually follows through on tougher Iran rhetoric or settles into the usual cycle of threats and negotiation.

daily_take.headline: Iran war odds just dropped 6.5 points. Here's what traders are seeing.
daily_take.deck: The market's pricing in a 27.5% chance the US strikes Iran by early March, down sharply from yesterday. Traders are betting cooler heads prevail, at least for the next 11 weeks. The $1.5M in volume suggests serious money just got more optimistic about de-escalation.

sidebar.headline: A two-day window separates these Iran strike odds. One's collapsing faster than the other.
sidebar.label: Iran Strike (March 9): 31.5%

sidebar.headline: Bitcoin bears are all in. Nearly 70% of traders expect a five-figure bottom next year.
sidebar.label: BTC Below $55K: 69.5%
